Doc: An fx curve object., which includes pricing inputs and term structures for fx forwards.

Source.Contents:
/#
   An fx curve object., which includes pricing inputs and term structures for fx forwards.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.FxCurve {
  # The name of the structure, e.g "USDLIBOR-3M EOD Curve".
  name : string?

  # The currency that the structure is expressed in (this is relevant mostly for the Interes Rates asset class).
  currency : string?

  # Defines the two currencies for an FX trade and the quotation relationship between the two currencies.
  quotedCurrencyPair : FpML5.recordkeeping.QuotedCurrencyPair?

  id : string?

}

name.Doc: The name of the structure, e.g "USDLIBOR-3M EOD Curve".
name.Name: name

currency.Doc: The currency that the structure is expressed in (this is relevant mostly for the Interes Rates asset class).
currency.Name: currency

quotedCurrencyPair.Doc: Defines the two currencies for an FX trade and the quotation relationship between the two currencies.
quotedCurrencyPair.Name: quotedCurrencyPair
